script:
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background "sea_fireworks"
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
@
マスターはグングニルを連れて
花火大会にやってきた

# textflame 1 1
# voice 3008 "gunguniru_0003"
@グングニル
咲いては散って…
なんとも儚く美しい

# textflame 1 1
@グングニル
…………

# textflame 1 1
@グングニル
…やはりすべては
滅びゆく必然なのだろうか

# select "そうなのかもしれない" "select_label_01" "それでも生きていこう" "select_label_02" "また生まれ変わるさ" "select_label_03"
…やはりすべては
滅びゆく必然なのだろうか

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 2
# fadeout "black" 1.2
